}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "19K-P02-3001R RoHS" and "WUBR-228N_V01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is using two [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 SE2595L] (2595L) dual-band front end modules.
===Models=== WUBR-507N is designed with multiple product SKUs to fit is all platforms. :Here are all the skus for this USB module:
:;SKU Part Name - Specification *WUBR-507N(M) - 6-Pin & U.FL Connector *WUBR-507N(MU) - USB Type A & U.FL Connector (19K-P02-3001R) *WUBR-507N(P) - USB Type A & Printed Antenna ([https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan387/ EW]) *WUBR-507N(P6) - 6-Pin & Printed Antenna (19K-A08-8301R)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.sparklan.com/downloadDataSheet.php?data_id=149 Datasheet] *[http://www.sparklan.com/download.php?prod_id=178 Drivers] ??"K-P02-3001R RoHS" and "WUBR-228N_V01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 '''Skyworks''' ( / '''SiGe''') SE2595L / 2595L dual-band front end modules].
